fact.description: The match is underway in Recife.
Benjamin Williams signals a free kick to Greece.
In Recife Greece attack through Lazaros Christodoulopoulos. The finish is off target, however.
Benjamin Williams awards Costa Rica a goal kick.
Throw-in for Greece in their own half.
Throw-in for Greece at Arena Pernambuco.
Throw-in Costa Rica.
Can Greece get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Costa Rica's half?
Costa Rica's Cristian Gamboa breaks free at Arena Pernambuco. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Greece at Arena Pernambuco.
Benjamin Williams signals a Costa Rica throw-in in Greece's half.
Greece to take a throw-in in Costa Rica territory.
Christian Bolanos for Costa Rica gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Greece goal kick.
Costa Rica have a goal kick.
Benjamin Williams signals a Costa Rica throw-in in Greece's half.
Benjamin Williams awards Greece a goal kick.
Free kick Greece.
Greece drive forward but Georgios Samaras is judged offside.
Greece's Lazaros Christodoulopoulos gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Goal kick for Costa Rica at Arena Pernambuco.
Ball goes out of play for a Greece goal kick.
Costa Rica awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick Costa Rica.
Corner awarded to Greece.
Greece's Sokratis misses with an attempt on goal.
Costa Rica have a goal kick.
Ball safe as Costa Rica is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can Greece get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Costa Rica's half?
Vasilis Torosidis for Greece is whistled offside.
Benjamin Williams signals a free kick to Costa Rica.
Costa Rica to take a throw-in in Greece territory.
Benjamin Williams signals a Costa Rica throw-in in Greece's half.
Benjamin Williams signals a free kick to Costa Rica just outside Greece's area.
Costa Rica have been awarded a corner by Benjamin Williams.
Benjamin Williams signals a throw-in for Costa Rica, close to Greece's area.
Corner awarded to Greece.
Throw-in Greece.
Greece have a dangerous throw-in.
Greece's Georgios Karagounis is on target but unsuccessful.
Throw-in for Costa Rica close to the penalty box.
Greece's Andreas Samaris has run offside.
Costa Rica have been awarded a corner by Benjamin Williams.
Lazaros Christodoulopoulos of Greece is pulled up for offside.
Can Costa Rica get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Greece's half?
Goal kick for Greece at Arena Pernambuco.
Benjamin Williams signals a free kick to Costa Rica in their own half.
Andreas Samaris (Greece) has received a yellow card from Benjamin Williams.
Dimitris Salpingidis of Greece smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Corner awarded to Greece.
Costa Rica awarded a free kick in their own half.
Costa Rica to take a throw-in in Greece territory.
Free kick Greece.
Greece's Dimitris Salpingidis is whistled for offside at Arena Pernambuco.
Benjamin Williams awards Costa Rica a goal kick.
Benjamin Williams signals a free kick to Greece in their own half.
Costa Rica will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Greece.
Oscar Duarte (Costa Rica) gets a yellow card.
Costa Rica awarded a free kick in their own half.
Greece awarded a free kick in their own half.
Andreas Samaris (Greece) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Can Greece capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Costa Rica's half?
In Recife Greece's Lazaros Christodoulopoulos is caught offside.
2 minutes will be added to the first half.
Benjamin Williams signals a free kick to Costa Rica in their own half.
The first-half has ended.
Benjamin Williams signals a free kick to Greece.
Greece push upfield and Georgios Samaras gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Costa Rica defence.
Greece awarded a free kick in their own half.
Yeltsin Tejeda (Costa Rica) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
Greece have been awarded a corner by Benjamin Williams.
Throw-in for Greece at Arena Pernambuco.
Greece surge into the attack at Arena Pernambuco but Sokratisâ€™s header is off-target.
Costa Rica have a goal kick.
Costa Rica awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Greece to take a throw-in in Costa Rica territory.
Christian Bolanos with an assist there.
Christian Bolanos (Costa Rica) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Benjamin Williams signals a Costa Rica throw-in in Greece's half.
Can Costa Rica get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Greece's half?
Benjamin Williams signals a free kick to Greece in their own half.
Oscar Granados (Costa Rica) is not on the pitch at the moment but still receives a yellow card.
Greece needs to be cautious. Costa Rica have an attacking throw-in.
Benjamin Williams signals a free kick to Greece in their own half.
Kostas Mitroglou is on a sub for Andreas Samaris for Greece.
Ball safe as Costa Rica is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Benjamin Williams signals a Greece throw-in in Costa Rica's half.
Ball goes out of play for a Costa Rica goal kick.
Costa Rica have a goal kick.
Greece awarded a free kick in their own half.
Greece's Kostas Mitroglou has run offside.
Throw-in for Greece in their own half.
Ball safe as Costa Rica is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Benjamin Williams signals a free kick to Costa Rica in their own half.
Throw-in Greece.
Free kick Greece.
Costa Rica make their first substitution with Jose Cubero replacing Yeltsin Tejeda.
Oscar Duarte (Costa Rica) leaves the pitch after receiving two yellow cards.
Greece attack but Georgios Samaras's header doesn't find the target.
Benjamin Williams awards Costa Rica a goal kick.
Benjamin Williams signals a free kick to Costa Rica.
Fernando Santos (Greece) is making a second substitution, with Fanis Gekas replacing Dimitris Salpingidis.
Greece awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Recife, Lazaros Christodoulopoulos (Greece) misses the target with a header.
Ball goes out of play for a Costa Rica goal kick.
Bryan Ruiz (Costa Rica) has received a first yellow card.
Benjamin Williams signals a free kick to Greece.
Free kick Costa Rica.
Greece's Constantinos Manolas has been booked in Recife.
Benjamin Williams signals a free kick to Greece in their own half.
Greece are pushing forward but Fanis Gekas's finish is wide of the goal.
Goal kick for Costa Rica at Arena Pernambuco.
Greece awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Jorge Luis Pinto is making the team's second substitution at Arena Pernambuco with Johnny Acosta replacing Cristian Gamboa.
Throw-in for Costa Rica at Arena Pernambuco.
Kostas Katsouranis is replacing Giannis Maniatis for Greece at Arena Pernambuco.
Free kick Greece.
Costa Rica have a goal kick.
In Recife Greece attack through Georgios Karagounis. The finish is off target, however.
Benjamin Williams signals a free kick to Greece.
Constantinos Manolas (Greece) wins the ball in the air but heads wide.
Goal kick for Costa Rica at Arena Pernambuco.
Ball goes out of play for a Costa Rica goal kick.
Randall Brenes is on a sub for Christian Bolanos for Costa Rica.
Greece awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Costa Rica in their own half.
Corner awarded to Greece.
Can Costa Rica get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Greece's half?
Free kick in a good position for Costa Rica!
Costa Rica to take a throw-in in Greece territory.
Benjamin Williams awards Costa Rica a goal kick.
Throw-in for Greece in their own half.
Greece to take a throw-in in Costa Rica territory.
Keylor Navas for Costa Rica has been booked by Benjamin Williams and receives a first yellow card.
Fanis Gekas for Greece drives towards goal at Arena Pernambuco. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Sokratis gets an equalizer for Greece. The score is now 1-1.
The second half is prolonged by 5 minutes of added time.
Greece push forward at Arena Pernambuco and Kostas Mitroglou gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the Costa Rica defence.
Attention is being given to Costa Ricaâ€™s Keylor Navas and play has been suspended briefly.
Costa Ricaâ€™s Keylor Navas is on his feet again at Arena Pernambuco.
Play has been resumed.
Greece have been awarded a corner by Benjamin Williams.
Costa Rica awarded a free kick in their own half.
Goal kick for Greece at Arena Pernambuco.
The score after normal time is 1-1.
The first extra period is now underway.
Benjamin Williams signals a free kick to Greece.
Benjamin Williams blows against Greece's Kostas Mitroglou for offside.
Ball safe as Greece is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Greece's Lazaros Christodoulopoulos gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Costa Rica have a goal kick.
Can Greece get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Costa Rica's half?
Fanis Gekas (Greece) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Ball goes out of play for a Costa Rica goal kick.
In Recife, Georgios Karagounis of Greece is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Benjamin Williams signals a Costa Rica throw-in in Greece's half.
Throw-in for Greece at Arena Pernambuco.
Benjamin Williams signals a free kick to Costa Rica in their own half.
Greece have been awarded a corner by Benjamin Williams.
Free kick Greece.
Important block from the Costa Rica defence as Kostas Katsouranis fires in a strike for Greece.
Corner awarded to Greece.
Greece awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Costa Rica get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Greece's half?
Throw-in Greece.
Benjamin Williams signals a free kick to Costa Rica in their own half.
Benjamin Williams awards Greece a goal kick.
Greece awarded a free kick in their own half.
Fanis Gekas of Greece is pulled up for offside.
It's 1-1 at the end of the first period.
The second extra period is just kicking-off.
Randall Brenes for Costa Rica gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Benjamin Williams awards Greece a goal kick.
Benjamin Williams signals a Greece throw-in in Costa Rica's half.
Throw-in for Greece close to the penalty box.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Recife to check on Keylor Navas, who is grimacing with pain.
Keylor Navas is back on the pitch.
Play has been resumed.
Goal kick for Costa Rica at Arena Pernambuco.
Free kick Costa Rica.
Costa Rica's Giancarlo Gonzalez breaks free at Arena Pernambuco. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Greece have a goal kick.
Greece awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Costa Rica goal kick.
Costa Rica have been awarded a corner by Benjamin Williams.
In Recife Greece drive forward through Lazaros Christodoulopoulos. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Greece drive forward and Georgios Karagounis gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Costa Rica awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Costa Rica in their own half.
Benjamin Williams signals a free kick to Greece in their own half.
Corner awarded to Greece.
Jose Holebas for Greece is whistled offside.
Greece are coming forward and Kostas Mitroglou gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Costa Rica have a goal kick.
Corner awarded to Greece.
2 minutes of injury time will be added to the first half.
Kostas Mitroglou gets his shot on target but fails to score for Greece.
Greece have been awarded a corner by Benjamin Williams.
Benjamin Williams signals a free kick to Costa Rica in their own half.
Throw-in for Greece at Arena Pernambuco.
Extra-time is over. The score is 1-1.
The match goes to penalties!
It's 6-4 at the end of the penalty shootout.
